name: Alive for another 10 seconds
description:
Get to the end of the level with the highest possible score. That’s the easy goal of this first person runner. A fully cycle takes 10 seconds. Every cycle consists of 2 phases. A red phase and a blue phase. Many game elements are only usable in one phase. Targets in the game give you some points for your score. If you do not increase your score over the time of a full cycle you will start to lose health. Run and warp your way through 4 - or maybe 5 - levels.

Made with Godot 3.5  for Ludum Dare 51 Jam

Controls:

WASD -> Move
Space -> Jump
Left Click -> Shoot
R -> respawn at last checkpoint
Esc -> Pause and free mouse

Controller works but you need the mouse to use the menus I think

Credits:
Everything: IamDevNull https://www.twitch.tv/iamdevnull
Also Everything: Cammymoop https://cammymoop.itch.io/
